entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Alliston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:49 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 11:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -12.0°C
Wind: WSW 25 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
